QuestData.Title: Stop the Spell Seekers
QuestData.Description:
The Nightborne are here in force. As if that were not worrying enough, they now bring reinforcements.
I have seen them opening large portals to Suramar.
Through these portals they have called in their constructs. They are immune to much of my magic and so represent something of a stumbling block to rejoining the others.
Find the portals and close as many as you can. That should buy us some time.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes! I can feel their spells receding. Soon I will be able to rejoin Thalrenus!
